description: Sends debugging information about the data to the log output. Passes the data through.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: An identifier to help identify the log entry in a bunch of other log entries.

parameters.name: level
parameters.description: The severity level of this message, defaults to `info`. Note that the level `error` forces the computation to be stopped!

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: A message to send in addition to the data.

returns.description: Returns the data as passed to the `data` parameter.
